name: Get_microsoft_graph_ediscovery_caseOperation_Item_As_microsoft_graph_ediscovery_caseExportOperation-0ecb
description: Get the item of type microsoft.graph.ediscovery.caseOperation as microsoft.graph.ediscovery.caseExportOperation

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**action**: The type of action the operation represents. Possible values are: addToReviewSet,applyTags,contentExport,convertToPdf,estimateStatistics, purgeData
**completedDateTime**: The date and time the operation was completed.
**createdBy**: The user that created the operation.
**createdDateTime**: The date and time the operation was created.
**resultInfo**: Contains success and failure-specific result information.
**status**: The status of the case operation. Possible values are: notStarted, submissionFailed, running, succeeded, partiallySucceeded, failed.
**azureBlobContainer**: The name of the Azure storage location where the export will be stored. This only applies to exports stored in your own Azure storage location.
**azureBlobToken**: The SAS token for the Azure storage location.  This only applies to exports stored in your own Azure storage location.
**description**: The description provided for the export.
**exportOptions**: The options provided for the export. For more details, see reviewSet: export. Possible values are: originalFiles, text, pdfReplacement, fileInfo, tags.
**exportStructure**: The options provided that specify the structure of the export. For more details, see reviewSet: export. Possible values are: none, directory, pst.
**outputName**: The name provided for the export.
**reviewSet**: The review set the content is being exported from.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
